headline: AI Is Eating the Grid -- And Apollo's Betting $100 Billion on the Power Shortage

headline: As national debt accelerates to $38 trillion, watchdog warns it’s ‘no way for a great nation like America to run its finances’
summary: In just a little over two months, the national debt swelled by $1 trillion. This is twice as fast as the rate of growth since 2000, Michael Peterson says.

raw.headline: As national debt accelerates to $38 trillion, watchdog warns it’s ‘no way for a great nation like America to run its finances’

headline: Bridge Renewable Energy Announces the Closing of an $80M Term Loan Facility to Support the Construction of a 40 MW Distributed Energy Solar and Battery Storage Portfolio
summary: SALT LAKE CITY, Oct. 22, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Bridge Renewable Energy (“BRE”), a subsidiary of Bridge Investment Group Holdings LLC and leading developer, owner, and operator of distributed generation solar and energy storage assets, today announced the closing of a portfolio financing consisting of an $80 million delayed draw term loan facility and $5 million revolving credit facility in partnership with Investec Bank, PLC (“Investec”), as sole lead arranger, with participating commitments
